sourcesContent:
import "./App.css";
// Khai báo các component trong react-bootstrap để thiết kế UI
import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap";
import Header from "./template/header";

function App() {
  return (
    <Container fluid>
      <Header/>
      <Row>
        <Col>Menu</Col>
      </Row>
      <Row>
        <Col>Banner</Col>
      </Row>
      <Row>
        <Col className="d-none d-sm-block" sm={2} md={2} style={{border:"1px solid green"}}>Left</Col>
        <Col sm={10} md={8} style={{border:"1px solid green"}}>Main</Col>
        <Col className="d-none d-sm-none d-md-block" md={2}  style={{border:"1px solid green"}}>Right</Col>
      </Row>
      <Row>
        <Col>Footer Left</Col>
        <Col>
          <Container fluid>
            <Row>
              <Col>Col-1</Col>
              <Col>Col-2</Col>
              <Col>Col-3</Col>
              <Col>Col-4</Col>
            </Row>
          </Container>
        </Col>
      </Row>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default App;
